trans-unit.source: Instructs the native image generation service to prepare a method for inclusion in a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 指示原生映像產生服務，以準備在限制的執行區域 (CER) 中包含的方法。

trans-unit.source: Apply the PrePrepareMethodAttribute attribute to a method or constructor to tell the native image generation service that the method (and its statically determinable call graph) is to be prepared for use in a CER.
trans-unit.target: PrePrepareMethodAttribute 屬性套用至方法或建構函式告訴方法 （其以靜態方式判斷呼叫歷程圖），請準備要使用 CER 中的原生映像產生服務。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is useful if the method to which it is applied will be prepared explicitly at run time, and the author of the method knows this and wants to avoid the overhead of run-time preparation.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性很有用，如果要套用的方法會明確地準備在執行階段，並知道這個方法的作者，並想要避免執行階段準備的額外負荷。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.PrePrepareMethodAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.PrePrepareMethodAttribute"></xref>類別。
